sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form id="Auth-View">
    <section class="d-flex flex-column main-form w-50 align-center main-form">
      <input class=" form-control form-control-lg" type="text" placeholder="Username"
        aria-label=".form-control-lg example">
      <input class=" form-control form-control-lg" type="text" placeholder="Password"
        aria-label=".form-control-lg example">
      <button @click.prevent="mounted" type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
    </section>
  </form>

  <button v-on:click="mounted">random button</button>
</template>


<script>

// import axios from 'axios';

import axios from "axios";

// import { json } from "body-parser";


export default {
  name: "Auth-View",
  data() {
    return {
      dataLogin: {
        username: null,
        password: null
      }

    };
  },

  methods: {
    mounted() {
      // GET request using axios with error handling
      axios("http://localhost:3000/api/user/auth", {
        method: "POST",
        body: JSON.stringify(this.dataLogin),
        headers: {
          'Accept': 'application/json',
          'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        }
      })
        .then((response) => response.json())

    }
  }
}
</script>
